data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 3, Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Atlas pushes forward through Javier Correa, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Puebla's Daniel Alvarez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Puebla have a goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Atlas a goal kick.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Throw-in Atlas.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 17, Free kick Atlas.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Puebla in the half of Atlas.
Puebla's Christian Tabo breaks free at Estadio Jalisco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 20, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Puebla.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Atlas throw-in in Puebla's half.
In the minute 25, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Barbosa is booked for the home team.
Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Atlas to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Renato Ibarra of Atlas gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Puebla.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 34, Oscar Macias Romo awards Puebla a goal kick.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 36, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 39, George Corral puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Daniel Alvarez.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a throw-in for Atlas, close to Puebla's area.
In the minute 41, Puebla have a goal kick.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Christian Tabo (Puebla) has received a first yellow card.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Ignacio Jeraldino of Atlas is pulled up for offside.
Daniel Alvarez (Puebla) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 53, Puebla have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Important block from the Atlas defence as Christian Tabo fires in a strike for Puebla.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Atlas are in shooting range from this free kick.
Atlas's Javier Correa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, Oscar Macias Romo awards Puebla a goal kick.
Javier Correa for Atlas drives towards goal at Estadio Jalisco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Puebla.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Atlas throw-in in Puebla's half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Guadalajara.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Omar Fernandez with Amaury Escoto. This is the first substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
Atlas make their first substitution with Luciano Acosta replacing Jesus Isijara.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Jalisco.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Puebla needs to be cautious. Atlas have an attacking throw-in.
Puebla are coming forward and Santiago Ormeno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 67, Atlas have a goal kick.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Atlas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
In the minute 69, Free kick Atlas.
Javier Correa (Atlas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Guadalajara to check on Amaury Escoto, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 72, Brayan Trejo is replacing Javier Correa for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Puebla’s Amaury Escoto is on his feet again at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 73, Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Juan Reynoso is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Salvador Reyes replacing Santiago Ormeno.
Juan Reynoso (Puebla) is making a third substitution, with Pablo Gonzalez Diaz replacing Christian Tabo.
In the minute 75, Atlas have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In Guadalajara Atlas attack through Luciano Acosta. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 76, Puebla drives forward and Daniel Alvarez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 79, Free kick Atlas.
In Guadalajara Atlas drive forward through Renato Ibarra. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
In the minute 81, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Jairo Torres is replacing Jose Abella for the home team.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Puebla have a goal kick.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team have replaced George Corral with Nestor Vicente Vidrio. This is the fourth substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
In the minute 84, Juan Reynoso is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Bernardo Cuesta replacing Daniel Alvarez.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amaury Escoto (Puebla) gets a yellow card.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Ignacio Jeraldino for Atlas gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Puebla.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Guadalajara.
In Guadalajara Atlas attack through Camilo Vargas. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
Puebla have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
That's full-time at Estadio Jalisco. The final score is 0-1.
